title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-SQLITE3-12549228 in sqlite3/libsqlite3-0@3.46.1-7
description:
## CVE-2025-7709

**Severity:** low
**Package:** sqlite3/libsqlite3-0@3.46.1-7
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2025-7709](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-7709)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `sqlite3` package and not the `sqlite3` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

An integer overflow exists in the  FTS5 https://sqlite.org/fts5.html Â extension. It occurs when the size of an array of tombstone pointers is calculated and truncated into a 32-bit integer. A pointer to partially controlled data can then be written out of bounds.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `sqlite3`.
